Posts.Content: Apr 30, 2008 11:54AM goodrhue wrote: Jacqui, I just had chemo, then surgery Apr 9 (RB mast), and radiation is next.  It is scary!  And, day by day is just how it goes.   I had seen pictures but was not prepared for looking at my own body the first time I took all the bandages off.  Lots of tears that day.   I appreciate all the posts from ladies much further along and know that my boobs aren't what makes me "me", beautiful or sexy, and I know we'll all get there eventually, but there are lots of moments in these early stages when my reaction is "yeah, right - maybe later".  I think the best thing is to make sure you have one or more good friends to cry with (husbands are nice but girlfriends rock), cry some good tears when needed, and then just take the next step.   Also read lots of the posts here - they are truly uplifting. -Leila
Posts.Title: Medieval imagery pre masectomy ! jacquibutterfly 2bubbas
